thread.title: J. Cole Announces "4 Your Eyez Only" World Tour Dates
thread.title_full: J. Cole Announces "4 Your Eyez Only" World Tour Dates

author: Chris Mitchell
title: J. Cole Announces "4 Your Eyez Only" World Tour Dates
text:
J. Cole Announces "4 Your Eyez Only" World Tour Dates February 21, 2017 | 8:34 AM 0 
J. Cole is taking his 4 Your Eyez Only album on the road, on a tour that will take him across North America, Europe and Australia throughout much of the second half of 2016. 
Cole announced the 4 Your Eyez Only Tour, which will make 57 stops between June 1 and December 9, on Twitter. 4 Your Eyez Only Tour. On sale Friday. See you in a few. https://t.co/uSjyv2SENG pic.twitter.com/bKfDXQLPgn 
Last October, the Dreamville boss told fans that he wouldn’t be performing for “a very long time,” although it turned out to be less than a year. 
Tickets for some locations are on sale through Cole’s website , with the rest on sale soon. 
Check out J. Cole’s 4 Your Eyez Only Tour dates below. North America Tour Dates 
06-01 Columbia, SC – The Music Farm 06-02 Jacksonville, FL – Mavericks Live 06-03 Tallahassee, FL – Potbelly’s 06-05 Jackson, MS – Hal & Hal’s 06-06 Birmingham, AL – Avondale Brewing Company 06-07 Baton Rouge, LA – Varsity Theatre 06-09 Little Rock, AR – Metroplex Event Center 06-11 Kansas City, MO – Arvest Bank Theatre @ the Midland 06-13 St. Louis, MO – The Pageant 06-14 Memphis, TN – The New Daisy Theater 06-15 Louisville, KY – Mercury Ballroom 06-17 Norfolk, VA – The Norva 06-18 Greensboro, NC – Cone Denim Entertainment Center 07-06 Phoenix, AZ – Talking Stick Resort Arena 07-08 Las Vegas, NV – MGM Grand Garden Arena 07-09 Anaheim, CA – Honda Center 07-11 Inglewood, CA – The Forum 07-15 Oakland, CA – Oracle Arena 07-17 Seattle, WA – Keyarena 07-18 Vancouver, British Columbia – Pepsi Live @ Rogers Arena 07-21 St. Paul, MN – Xcel Energy Center 07-23 Auburn Hills, MI – The Palace of Auburn Hills 07-24 Chicago, IL – United Center 07-28 Toronto, Ontario – Air Canada Centre 08-01 Brooklyn, NY – Barclays Center 08-04 Boston, MA – TD Garden 08-05 Uniondale, NY – Nassau Veterans Memorial Coliseum 08-06 Baltimore, MD – Royal Farms Arena 08-08 Washington, DC – Verizon Center 08-09 Charlotte, NC – Spectrum Center 08-11 Duluth, GA – Infinite Energy Arena 08-14 Miami, FL – American Airlines Arena 08-16 Orlando, FL – Amway Center 08-18 Houston, TX – Toyota Center 08-19 Austin, TX – Frank Erwin Center 08-20 Dallas, TX – American Airlines Center Europe Tour Dates 
09-29 Copenhagen, Denmark – Tap 1 09-30 Oslo, Norway – Spektrum
